glowmelt.name: GLOWMELT_NAME
glowmelt.description: A faint, stubborn glow meant to shove back the dark. Don't expect it to light your whole bloody workshop!
glowmelt.instructions:
Light a fire under your cauldron — glowing embers won’t cut it.
		At full boil, toss in a pinch of Wild Lavender. Breathe too close, and you’ll know why.
		Stir four times clockwise. Gentle won’t do.
		Drop in a Whisper Shell — straight down, mind the hiss.
		Slip in a shred of Paper while it’s looking the other way.
		Six counter-clockwise stirs.
		If the glow starts to sink, you’ve nailed it. If it floats… best stand back.

ui_effects.negative: Room darkens & interactables become difficult to see.

swift_hand.name: Swift Hand
swift_hand.description: A quick tap sends your ingredients straight into the cauldron. Saves your hands the extra work!
swift_hand.instructions:
Get a fire roaring beneath your cauldron — none of this flickering rubbish.
		When it hits a full boil, sling in a Stray Feather. Quick, before it floats off.
		Give it five good stirs to the right. Not a twitch more.
		Drop in a Wild Ember Twig — straight in, don’t fiddle about.
		Now, quietly slip in a Pebble Heart. Don’t ask, don’t look.
		Two turns to the left. If your hand feels lighter after, well… that’s the point.

ui_effects.positive: Selecting ingredients automatically adds them to the current recipe.

invisibility.name: Invisibility
invisibility.description: Makes you fade just enough to slip by unnoticed.
invisibility.instructions:
Light a proper fire beneath your cauldron — no embers, no excuses.
		When the boil kicks in, toss in a Stray Feather. Don’t blink.
		Three stirs to the right — tight circles, none of this lazy wobble.
		In with a Flicker Berry. Whole. Yes, whole.
		Slip a shred of Paper in after — quietly, like it was never there.
		Two counter-clockwise stirs. If the surface starts fading, stop stirring. You’ll lose the lot.

ui_effects.positive: Mentor/Narrator believes you to be gone, decreases remarks or criticisms from narrator.
ui_effects.negative: The room becomes over-bright and saturated making it slightly uncomfortable.

tattle_tonic.name: Tattle Tonic
tattle_tonic.description: Catch whispers lurking in the air, if you've got the senses to listen to them!
tattle_tonic.instructions:
Set a fire beneath your cauldron — decent heat, none of that half-hearted spark business.
		At a rolling boil, drop in a Pebble Heart. Mind the splash; it bites.
		Stir five times clockwise. Steady, not frantic.
		Toss in a pinch of Wild Lavender — right into the heart of it.
		Now, slip in a Whisper Shell. Quietly.
		Two slow stirs to the left. If the mix starts shifting faster than your hand, you’re nearly there.

ui_effects.positive: Can hear narrator's inner thoughts, player will know when narrator is lying.

pocket_puff.name: Pocket Puff
pocket_puff.instructions:
Kindle a decent flame beneath your cauldron — none of this timid flicker nonsense.
		Once your brew greets a proper boil, toss in a shred of Paper (yes, even that bit you meant to throw out).
		Stir twice to the right — steady hands, no flapping.
		Drop in a Whisper Shell, and mind the splash.
		Follow sharp with a pinch of Wild Lavender; don’t ask why, you’ll know soon enough.
		Stir thrice to the left. If it hisses, you’re on the right track.

ui_effects.positive: Can hear narrator's inner thoughts, player will know when narrator is lying.
